# Canadian Integrated Program for Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance (CIPARS) Poultry Veterinarian Services
=====================================================

### Tender Announcement

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking proposals from contractors to provide veterinary services for the CIPARS program. This program aims to maintain and sustain a national farm antimicrobial drug use and resistance surveillance network across major poultry-producing provinces in Canada.

### Project Overview
-------------------

The contractor selected for this project will be responsible for collecting and analyzing data on antimicrobial use and resistance in microbes isolated from poultry. The data will provide valuable insights into the epidemiology of food and water-borne diseases, antimicrobial resistance, and antimicrobial use in poultry production.

### Contract Specifications
---------------------------

* **Contract Period**: The expected contract start date is September 29, 2023, and the expected end date is January 31, 2024.
* **Contracting Entity**: The contracting entity for this project is the Public Health Agency of Canada.
* **Contact Information**: Drew Johnson can be contacted via email at [drew.johnson@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:drew.johnson@hc-sc.gc.ca) or phone at (613) 941-2102.

### Requirements and Qualifications
--------------------------------

The contractor selected for this project must have expertise in veterinary services, particularly in the field of antimicrobial resistance surveillance. The contractor must also have experience working with poultry farms and in the collection and analysis of biological samples.

### Notice and Attachment
-------------------------

A notice and attachments for this tender announcement can be found at: 

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9053/npp-final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9053/2023-amended-npp-poultry-bidders-template-english.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9053/2023-amended-npp-poultry-bidders-template-french.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9053/npp-final-fr.pdf)

### Closing Date and Time
---------------------------

The tender closing date is December 15, 2023, at 13:00 Eastern Time. No late submissions will be accepted.

Please note that this tender announcement is now expired.
